member.name: LSA_FOREST_TRUST_RECORD_TYPE
member.summary: The LSA_FOREST_TRUST_RECORD_TYPE enumeration defines the type of a Local Security Authority forest trust record.

member.name: LSA_FOREST_TRUST_RECORD_TYPE.ForestTrustTopLevelName
member.summary: Record contains an included top-level name.

member.name: LSA_FOREST_TRUST_RECORD_TYPE.ForestTrustTopLevelNameEx
member.summary: Record contains an excluded top-level name.

member.name: LSA_FOREST_TRUST_RECORD_TYPE.ForestTrustRecordTypeLast
member.summary: Marks the end of an enumeration.
